userprofilev2-user-locked: This user account has been globally disabled.
userprofilev2-apierror-forbidden: Forbidden: you do not have permission to change this avatar.
userprofilev2-apierror-invalidpermission: Forbidden: you do not have permission to edit the profile of $1
userprofilev2-apierror-nofile: No file was provided to upload.
userprofilev2-apierror-ratelimited: You cannot upload images at this time.
userprofilev2-apierror-invalidusername: No user registered with the username '$1' on this wiki.
userprofilev2-about-me-help: Tell us about yourself. 200 characters max.
userprofilev2-showglobalgroupshelp: Show global user groups that I am part of (will be visible to everyone)
userprofilev2-showglobaleditcounthelp: Show my global edit count from CentralAuth (will be visible to everyone)
userprofilev2-helptext: Use this dialog to change the contents of your user profile.
